title: java无法安装
author: sasahsasah
txt_content:
本帖最后由 sasahsasah 于 2014-11-21 09:52 编辑 

重装了系统，win7 64位，然后就无法安装64位java了，下载的绿色版java设置好之后一闪就跳出来了， 报错是个atioXXX的错误，求大神解答啊


#
# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006b73ea2b, pid=1320, tid=2376
#
# JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (7.0_71-b14) (build 1.7.0_71-b14)
# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (24.71-b01 mixed mode windows-amd64 compressed oops)
# Problematic frame:
# C  [atio6axx.dll+0xd7ea2b]
#
# Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows
#

replies.author: zhh0000zhh
replies.txt_content:
显卡驱动有问题
此外，绿色版java都是都比的。
去下完整版吧。

replies.author: xiaojiahuo3
replies.txt_content: 可能是JAVA安装包的问题，去下个64位java8吧，20多M很快的！

replies.author: minecraftlittle
replies.txt_content:
